faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Resolve your doubts about privacy, functionality and Luna features
faq.a1: Yes! Privacy is our top priority. All your data is encrypted and stored securely. You have full control over your information and can export or delete your data at any time. We never share your personal information without your explicit consent.
faq.q2: How does Luna's Artificial Intelligence work?
faq.a2: Our AI analyzes your tracking data (cycle, sleep, mood and energy) to identify unique patterns in your body. Based on these analyses, it generates personalized Wellness Plans with practical and actionable recommendations, specifically tailored for you. The more you use it, the more accurate the recommendations become.
faq.q3: What's the difference between Plans and Wellness Plans?
faq.a3: Plans are our subscription plans (Free and Premium) that define which features you have access to. Wellness Plans are the personalized recommendations generated by our AI based on your tracking data, such as sleep routines, nutritional tips and exercises.
faq.q4: What's included in the Free Plan?
faq.a4: The Free Plan includes basic tracking of cycle, sleep, mood and energy, access to AI assistant with limited responses, data visualization in simple charts and basic notifications. It's perfect to start understanding your body and routine better.
faq.a5: Voice transcription is only available in the Premium Plan and allows you to log your tracking information by speaking instead of typing. Our AI automatically transcribes your voice and analyzes the content to fill in the fields and generate personalized insights.
faq.q6: Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
faq.a6: Yes, you can cancel your Premium subscription at any time without additional costs. Your data will remain secure and you'll continue to have access to Free Plan features. There's no loyalty period or cancellation fees.

pricing.faqA1: Yes! If you upgrade, you'll have immediate access to Premium features. If you downgrade, Premium features will remain until the end of the paid period.
pricing.faqQ2: How does the free trial work?
pricing.faqA2: You have 7 days of full access to Premium features at no cost. Cancel before the trial period ends and you won't be charged. No credit card required to start.
pricing.faqA3: Your data remains saved and you keep access to free features. You can reactivate Premium anytime and continue where you left off. Your insights and history won't be lost.
pricing.faqA4: Yes! Your data is encrypted and securely stored. You have full control over your information and can export or delete your data anytime. We never share or sell your personal information.

physicalPain.title: Physical Pain
physicalPain.message: I know it hurts. You are strong and will overcome this. How about trying one of these techniques to relieve it?
physicalPain.technique2: Apply a warm compress to the area

anxiety.title: Anxiety/Stress
anxiety.message: It's okay to feel this. You're not alone. Let's calm down together?
anxiety.technique1: 5-4-3-2-1 Technique: Identify 5 things you see, 4 you touch, 3 you hear, 2 you smell, 1 you taste
anxiety.technique2: 4-7-8 Breathing: Inhale for 4s, hold for 7s, exhale for 8s

fatigue.title: Extreme Fatigue
fatigue.message: Your body is asking for rest. It's okay to take a break. You deserve this care.
fatigue.technique2: Drink a glass of cold water

irritation.title: Irritation/PMS
irritation.message: Your feelings are valid. It's normal to feel this way at this phase. Let's find a way to help you?
irritation.technique4: Watch something that makes you laugh

privacy.title: Privacy is not
privacy.subtitle: In a world where reproductive data is increasingly exposed, Luna was built with privacy from day one. Your health data is yours ‚Äî and always will be.
privacy.encryptedDesc: All your information is protected with end-to-end encryption.
privacy.controlDesc: You decide what to share and can delete your data at any time.
privacy.transparencyDesc: Audit logs available so you can see exactly how your data is used.
privacy.yourDataDesc: Export or delete your information whenever you want, without complications.
privacy.commitmentText: We work with independent audits and follow security best practices. Aggregated and anonymous data is only shared for research with your explicit opt-in consent.
